name: UCLA Loneliness Scale (3-item)
description: A 3-item short form of the UCLA Loneliness Scale suitable for telephone surveys and brief assessments. Measures feelings of social isolation and loneliness.
reference: Hughes, M. E., Waite, L. J., Hawkley, L. C., & Cacioppo, J. T. (2004). A short scale for measuring loneliness in large surveys: Results from two population-based studies. Research on Aging, 26(6), 655-672.

questions.name: ucla3_1
questions.description: How often do you feel that you lack companionship?

questions.name: ucla3_2
questions.description: How often do you feel left out?

questions.name: ucla3_3
questions.description: How often do you feel isolated from others?
